column1: * 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to L. Sprague de Camp.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes to a birthday party for Denis Tolhursts wife.
* 1981 - The twenty-sixth and last episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1992 - The Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series) of Smith of Wootton Major is aired on BBC.
* 2018 - The Fall of Gondolin is published.
